formName: Register as a childrenâ€™s social care provider

sections.title: Have you got evidence to show your organisation has the funds to run your proposed children's social care service?
sections.shortName: Evidence to show funds to run proposed children's service

fields.infoText: Before you start this application to register a children's social care service, you will need to upload evidence of your organisation's financial viability for us to consider your eligibility to be a social care provider.

You will need to upload these documents as evidence:

- financial reference from your bank
-  business plan 
-  cash-flow forecast
- company's last 2 annual reports (if you have them)
- company's last 2 annual accounts  (if you have them)

fields.label: Local councils and NHS trusts do not need to provide these documents
fields.infoText: Local councils and NHS trusts do not need to provide these documents

choices: No, I do not have evidence
No, I do not need to provide evidence as a local council or NHS trust

sections.title: You do not have the right documents to continue with this application
sections.shortName: No evidence to show funds to run proposed children's service

fields.label: You do not have the right documents to continue with this application
fields.infoText: By law, you must provide your organisation's financial documents with your application.

You should prepare these documents before you continue as you will be asked to upload them in the application.

We will reject your application without them.

sections.title: What type of business do you want to apply as ?
sections.shortName: Type of business applying as

fields.label: bisInfo1
fields.infoText: We must know your business type to register all the authorised individuals and managers involved in your new children's  social care service.

optionHelpText: Including limited companies, charities, local councils, limited liability partnerships (LLP) and unincorporated associations
Including a person and groups of them who have not set up their business as a company or partnership

sections.title: Was your company set up in the last 2 years?
sections.shortName: Company set up in the last 2 years
sections.description: We need to know if you have filed any accounts with Companies House so that we can check them to see if you have the funds to run your new children's social care service.

sections.title: Your organisation's registration details
sections.shortName: Organisation's registration details

fields.label: Organisation name
fields.helpText: This is the name of your organisation running the establishment. For example, Social care limited.

fields.label: Trading start date
fields.helpText: If you are a company, this is the date you registered with Companies House. It can be found on your Certificate of Incorporation. For example, 31 3 1980. Leave blank if you are not a company.

fields.label: Registered charity number
fields.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have a registered charity number

fields.label: Registered company number
fields.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have a registered company number

sections.title: Your organisation's contact details
sections.shortName: Organisation's contact details

fields.infoText: We may contact you using these details  when checking your application

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: This is your organisation's number. Include area code, for example 020 7960 0000

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: This is the main email used for business. For example, info@company.co.uk

sections.shortName: Is organisation a subsidiary of a company

fields.helpText: If you are a company, this is the date you registered with Companies House. It can be found on your Certificate of Incorporation. For example, 31 3 1980. Leave blank if you are not a company.

fields.label: Registered charity number if applicable
fields.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have a registered charity number

fields.label: Registered company number if applicable
fields.helpText: Leave blank if you do not have a registered company number

fields.label: URN of subsidiary
fields.helpText:
It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. 

For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  

From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

sections.description: We want to know about your organisation not the establishment or agency you are applying to register.

fields.label: What is your type of organisation?
optionHelpText: This includes a private limited company and LLP that have been incorporated by Companies House.
This includes a local council, a trust or school governing body
A group of people who run an organisation. For example, social care committee of a local community

sections.title: Are you applying to register a school as a children's home?

fields.label: edCH
fields.infoText: This can be an existing or planned school that  you plan to provide boarding for more than 295 days.

fields.shortName: Register educational establishment as children's home

sections.title: What is your school's Department for Education (DfE) number?
sections.shortName: School's DFE number

fields.label: DfEInfo
fields.infoText: We need your DfE number to let the Department for Education know that you have applied to register as a children's home.

fields.label: How do I find my DfE number?
fields.infoText: You can find your DfE number at the  [find and compare schools service](https://www.gov.uk/school-performance-tables) .

fields.label: DfE number
fields.helpText: It's 7 digits in this format, 689/1234

fields.label: Ofsted regististration number (URN) of existing social care service
How do I find my Ofsted URN?
fields.infoText:
It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. 

For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  

From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

fields.label: Details of last application
fields.helpText: Include the date of when the application was made, name of children's social care service and address.

sections.title: Does your organisation have financial interests in any children's social care service registered with Ofsted?

sections.description: We need to check details of all establishments or agencies that your organisation has a financial interest in against records we hold.

fields.infoText: If you are an individual this means working for another organisation.

fields.label: Does your organisation have financial interests in any children's social care service registered with Ofsted?
If you are part of a holding company, we do not need to know about their financial interests.
fields.infoText: If you are part of a holding company, we do not need to know about their financial interests.

sections.title: Have you ever been registered or given a licence to run children and social care services by law?
sections.shortName: Registered or given a licence to run children and social care services

fields.infoText:
We want to know if you have provided any of these services before:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

fields.label: This does not include children social care services registered with Ofsted that you may have already told us about earlier in this application.
fields.infoText: This does not include children social care services registered with Ofsted that you may have already told us about earlier in this application.

sections.title: Give us details of the previous registrations with other authorities
sections.shortName: Details of previous registrations with other authorities

fields.label: You do not need to provide details of children's social care services registered by Ofsted that you may have told us about earlier in this application.
fields.infoText: You do not need to provide details of children's social care services registered by Ofsted that you may have told us about earlier in this application.

fields.label: What details should I include?
fields.infoText:
Provide details of the previous registration including:

- who you registered with
- name of the registered social care services
- length of time it was registered for
- Ofsted URNs of applications you haven't told us about already 
- what type of service you registered. 

For example, an adult social care service registered with the Care Quality Commission called Adult Care limited, registered from 2012 to 2016.

sections.title: Have you ever had an application refused or registration cancelled to provide children and social care services?
sections.shortName: Ever had application refused or registration cancelled

fields.infoText:
We want to know if your previous application to provide any of these services have been refused or registration cancelled to check your eligibility to be a social care provider:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

sections.title: Tell us about all of your refused or cancelled applications with Ofsted or other authorities
sections.shortName: About your refused or cancelled applications

fields.infoText:
Provide details of the previous application including:

- information about the type of service 
- dates of application or registration
- reasons why the application was refused or the registration cancelled
- whether this was by Ofsted or another organisation
- any other detail you think is relevant

fields.label: How do I find the URN of my refused establishment or agency?
fields.infoText:
It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. 

For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  

From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

fields.label: URN of refused establishment or agency registered with Ofsted
fields.helpText: Leave blank if the service was not registered with Ofsted

sections.title: Has your organisation ever owned, been registered or given a licence to run children and social care services under law?
sections.shortName: Registered or given a licence to run children and social care services

fields.infoText:
We want to know if you have provided any of these services before:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

fields.label: This does not include children social care services registered with Ofsted that you may have already told us about earlier in this application.
fields.infoText: This does not include children social care services registered with Ofsted that you may have already told us about earlier in this application.

sections.title: Give us more details of all your previous registrations with other authorities
sections.shortName: Details of previous registrations with other authorities

fields.label: What details should I include?
fields.infoText:
Provide details of the previous registration including:

- who you registered with, names of the establishments or agencies, 
- length of time it was registered for,
- Ofsted URNs  of applications you haven't told us about already 
- what type of service you registered. 

For example, an adult social care service registered with the Care Quality Commission called Adult Care limited, registered from 2012 to 2016.

fields.label: You do not need to provide details of children's social care services registered by Ofsted that you may have told us already earlier in this application.
fields.infoText: You do not need to provide details of children's social care services registered by Ofsted that you may have told us already earlier in this application.

sections.title: Upload your organisation's financial reference from your bank
sections.shortName: Financial reference from bank

fields.infoText: We'll need a financial reference from your bank to show you have the funds to run the social care establishment or agency you want to register with us.

fields.label: Upload your organisation's financial reference from your bank
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG. 
You can upload a file up to 2MB. 
If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your organisation's business plan
sections.shortName: Business plan

fields.infoText: We need to see your business plan to assess your long-term plan to run and maintain the social care establishment or agency you want to register with us.

fields.label: Upload your organisation's business plan
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG. 
You can upload a file up to 2MB. 
If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your organisation's cash flow forecast
sections.shortName: Cash flow forecast

fields.infoText: We need to see your cash flow forecast to assess your long-term plan to run and maintain the social care establishment or agency you want to register with us.

fields.label: Upload your organisation's cash flow forecast
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG. 
You can upload a file up to 2MB. 
If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your company's annual accounts
sections.shortName: Company's annual accounts

fields.infoText:
We need to see your last 2 annual accounts if you have been trading at least for the last 2 years.

You only need to upload the previous year's accounts if you have been trading for less than 2 years.

fields.label: Upload your company's annual accounts
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG. 
You can upload a file up to 2MB. 
If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your company's last annual reports
sections.shortName: Company's annual reports

fields.infoText:
We need to see your last 2 annual reports if you have been trading at least for the last 2 years.

You only need to upload the previous year's report if you have been trading for less than 2 years.

fields.label: Upload your company's last annual reports
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG. 
You can upload a file up to 2MB. 
If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Has your organisation ever had an application refused or registration cancelled to provide children and social care services?
sections.shortName: Organisation ever had application refused or registration cancelled

fields.infoText:
We want to know if your previous application to provide any of these services have been refused or registration cancelled to check your eligibility to be a social care provider:

- residential care home
- children's homes
- childcare, childminding or daycare services
- nurses' agencies
- children's social care services
- health and adult social care services

sections.title: Tell us about your refused or cancelled application with Ofsted or another organisation
sections.shortName: About your refused or cancelled applications

fields.infoText:
Provide details of the previous application including:

- information about the type of service provided
- dates of application or registration
- reasons why the application was refused or the registration cancelled
- whether this was by Ofsted or another organisation
- any other detail you think is relevant

fields.label: Company registered name (if you have one)
fields.helpText: This must be the same name as registered with Companies house, not a trading name.

fields.label: Company certificate number (if you have one)
fields.helpText: This can be found on your certificate of incorporation document.

fields.label: URN of refused establishment or agency
fields.helpText: It's on correspondence letters from Ofsted. For registrations before 2015,  the number starts with SC and has 6 digits, for example, SC123456.  From 2015, it's 7 digits. For example, 1234567.

fields.label: This does not include children social care services registered with Ofsted that you may have already told us about earlier in this application.

fields.label: Company registered name (if you have one)
fields.helpText: This must be the same name as registered with Companies house, not a trading name.

sections.title: How many people need to be registered for your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: Number of people to register for children's service
sections.description:
We need to know about each person in your organisation who will have an active role in running the establishment or agency.

They will be responsible for making sure the establishment or agency meets the social care standards required by law.

fields.label: Do not include the person who will register as the manager or responsible individual
fields.infoText: Do not include the person who will register as the manager or responsible individual

sections.title: How many people will be involved in running your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: Number of people involved in running children's service
sections.description:
We need to know about each person in your organisation who will have an active role in running the children's social care service.

They will be responsible for making sure the establishment or agency meets the social care standards required by law.

You could include all the directors, secretaries, clerks, treasurers and trustees that will be involved.

fields.label: Do not include the person who will register as the manager or responsible individual.
fields.infoText: Do not include the person who will register as the manager or responsible individual.

sections.title: Tell us about the people you want to register to run the children's social care service?
sections.shortName: About the people you want to register

fields.infoText: We will add these individuals to your establishment's or agency's registration certificate.

fields.label: Date of birth
fields.helpText: Enter the date of birth in this format, dd/mm/yyyy. For example, 31 12 1980

fields.label: Position in company
fields.helpText: For example a director, secretary, manager, clerk, treasurer or trustee

fields.label: Will this person have management responsibility?
Will this person have contact with children or young people?

sections.title: How many people will be involved in running your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: Number of people involved in running children's service
sections.description:
We need to know about each person in your organisation who will have an active role in running the establishment or agency.

They will be responsible for making sure the establishment or agency meets the social care standards required by law.

You could include all the directors, secretaries, clerks, treasurers and trustees that will be involved.

fields.label: How many people will be involved in running your establishment or agency?

sections.title: Tell us about the people who will be involved in running your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: About the people who will be involved in your children's service

fields.infoText: By law, you must tell us about each person who will have an active role in running your organisation. This could be the director, manager, secretary, clerk, treasurer, trustees and other officers.

fields.label: Do not include the people who will register as the manager or the responsible individual for the establishment or agency.
fields.infoText: Do not include the people who will register as the manager or the responsible individual for the establishment or agency.

fields.label: Date of birth
fields.helpText: Enter the date of birth in this format, dd/mm/yyyy. For example, 31 12 1980

fields.label: Will this person have management responsibility?
Will this person have contact with children or young people?

sections.title: How many partners will be involved in running your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: Number of partners who will be involved
sections.description:
We need to know about each partner in your partnership who will have an active role in running the establishment or agency.

They will be responsible for making sure the establishment or agency meets the social care standards required by law.

fields.label: Do not include the person who will register as the manager.
fields.infoText: Do not include the person who will register as the manager.

sections.title: Tell us about the partners involved in running your children's social care service?
sections.shortName: About the partners who will be involved in your children's service
sections.description: Each partner in the partnership must apply to register to run a social care service separately and have their own registration certificate.

fields.label: Date of birth
fields.helpText: Enter the date of birth in this format, dd/mm/yyyy. For example, 31 12 1980

fields.label: Role in partnership
fields.helpText: Describe role of partner. For example, partner is responsible for managing finances of partnership.

fields.label: Will this partner have management responsibility?
Will this partner have contact with children or young people?

sections.title: Tell us about the responsible individual for your organisation
sections.shortName: Responsible individual for your organisation
sections.description: Suggest a responsible individual to represent your organisation when dealing with us. This could be a director or manager of your organisation.

fields.label: Position in company
fields.helpText: For example a director, secretary, manager, clerk, treasurer or trustee

fields.label: Will this person have contact with children or young people?
Will this person have management responsibility?

sections.title: Tell us about the partner nominated to represent your partnership
sections.shortName: Nominated partner for your partnership
sections.description: Suggest a responsible partner to represent your partnership when dealing with us. This could be the director or head of your partnership.

fields.label: Role in partnership
fields.helpText: Describe role of partner. For example, partner is responsible for managing finances of partnership.

fields.label: Will this partner have contact with children or young people?
Will this partner have management responsibility?

This is your main office where you provide the social care service.

sections.title: Describe the premises of your children's social care service
sections.shortName: Description of premises
sections.description: We need to know about the building you will operate from to decide if it is appropriate for your registration.

fields.label: Describe the premises
fields.helpText: We only need to more about the building of the premises. Include details such as whether the premises are purpose-built or converted and the type of neighbourhood where it is located. For example, it is on a residential street or main road.

sections.title: Are the premises ready to meet the needs of your service users?
sections.shortName: Are the premises ready
sections.description: By law, you need to tell us if your premises are ready to provide the social care service as set out in your statement of purpose.

fields.label: Are the premises ready to meet the needs of the service users as set out in the statement of purpose?

sections.title: Describe the building or conversion you need to make
sections.shortName: Description of building or conversion to make

fields.label:
Describe building work or conversions you need to meet the aims of the service.
For example, need to add a conservatory and meeting room to facilitate family contact.
Date of when the premises will be ready
fields.helpText: For example, 31 03 1999

sections.title: Can you use the premises without changing the existing planning permission?
sections.shortName: Can the premises be used without change

sections.title: Have you got planning permission for your premises?
sections.shortName: Planning permission for premises

fields.label: What evidence should I provide?
fields.infoText: You will need to give us evidence of your planning permission for your premises from your local authority to run the establishment or agency.

choices: Yes, I have planning permission or certficate of lawfulness
No, but I can give a written confirmation from the local council that I do not need planning permission
No, but my planning application is being considered. I can give my planning application to Ofsted.
optionHelpText: When your planning permission application has been approved, you can send your documents by email to enquiries@Ofsted.gov.uk.

sections.title: Upload your organisation's planning permission document
sections.shortName: Organisation's planning permission document

fields.label: TypeofPlanningDocEvidence
fields.infoText:
You need to provide one of these documents:

- copy of planning permission granted

- certificate of lawfulness

- copy of a planning application

- evidence that planning permission is not required

fields.label: Upload document
fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: You do not have planning permission to continue with this application
sections.shortName: No planning permission to continue

fields.label: You do not have the right documents to continue with this application
fields.infoText: By law, you must provide your organisation's financial documents with your application.

You should prepare these documents before you continue as you will be asked to upload them in the application.

We will reject your application without them.

sections.title: Does the building meet the access requirements of the Equality Act 2010?
sections.shortName: Building meet access requirement

fields.label: Does the building meet the access requirements of the Equality Act 2010?

sections.title: Why do the premises not meet the access requirements?
sections.shortName: Why premises not meet access requirement

fields.label: Why do the premises not meet the access requirements?

sections.title: What are the security arrangements of the premises?
sections.shortName: Security arrangements of the premises

fields.label: What are the security arrangements of the premises?
fields.helpText:
Explain how you will protect the information you hold and how you will make your premises secure.

For example, you keep your sensitive papers locked in a safe and password-protect your electronic documents.

sections.title: Tell us about the number of staff posts you will have at your premises
sections.shortName: Number of staff posts at your premises
sections.description: You must include everyone that will be working at your premises.

fields.label: Will anyone be living on the premises?

sections.title: What staff posts will you recruit for to care for children and young people?
sections.shortName: Staff posts to recruit for children's service
sections.description: Add details for each post separately. We will discuss your staff posts further when we visit you.

fields.label: Duties and responsibilities
fields.helpText: Include the main tasks they'll carry out and the responsibilities they'll have on a daily basis. For example, plan and run social activities for children.

fields.label: Do you need to add another post?

sections.title: What staff posts will you recruit for to care for children and young people?
sections.shortName: Staff posts to recruit for children's service

fields.label: Do you need to add another position?

sections.title: What staff posts will you recruit for to care for children and young people?
sections.shortName: Staff posts to recruit for children's service

sections.title: What type of establishment is your children's home?
sections.shortName: Type of children's home

fields.label: What type of establishment is your children's home?
choices: Refuge under section 51 of the Children Act 1989
Residential special school (accommodating any child for more than 295 days a year)
Boarding school (other than a special school) accommodating any child for more than 295 days a year
Children's home (not in any of the other types above)

sections.title: How many registered places do you need for your children's home?
sections.shortName: Total number of places for your children's home
sections.description: We want to know the maximum number of children you will care for in your home.

sections.title: Tell us about the number of children with needs you will have at your home
sections.shortName: Number of children with needs at your home
sections.description: By law, you must tell us how many children in the categories below will live at your home.

fields.label: Number of children with emotional or behavioural difficulties
Number of children with physical disabilities
Number of children with learning disabilities
Number of children with mental disorders only
fields.helpText: Do not include children with learning disabilities. Add them to the category above.

fields.label: Number of children with drug problems
Number of children with alcohol problems
Number of children with hearing or eyesight difficulties

sections.title: Will the children's home be single sex occupancy?
sections.shortName: Home for single sex occupancy

fields.label: Will the home be single sex occupancy?

fields.label: Age of youngest child
fields.helpText: For example, 8

fields.label: Age of oldest child
fields.helpText: For example, 16

fields.label: Have you appointed an independent person who meets the criteria of regulation 43 of The Children's Homes (England) Regulations 2015?

sections.shortName: Children's home CQC registration details

fields.label: Give us details of your children's home CQC registration
fields.helpText: Include a registration number if relevant, and tell us if you're already registered or if you are applying to register with the CQC.

sections.title: Will you provide a short-breaks service?
sections.shortName: Provide short-breaks service
sections.description: Short breaks services provide opportunities for disabled children to spend time away from their primary carers. This can include overnight or weekend activities.

sections.shortName: Charges for people using children's home

fields.label: How much will you charge the people using your children's home?
fields.shortName: Range of fees for children's home services
fields.helpText: Include details of the range of fees for all the services you will provide.

sections.shortName: Arrangement for foster parent to provide refuge

sections.shortName: Agency to provide fostering for adoption

fields.label: Is your agency going to provide fostering for adoption?
fields.shortName: Agency providing fostering for adoption service

fields.label: Have you set up a fostering panel?
Will you set up more than one fostering panel?
Will you share a joint fostering panel with another agency or agencies?

sections.shortName: Charges for people using fostering agency

fields.shortName: Range of fees for fostering agency services
fields.helpText: Include details of the range of fees for all the services you will provide.

sections.title: How many families will live at the residential family centre?
sections.shortName: Number of familiies to live at family centre

fields.label: How many families will you accommodate at the residential family centre?
fields.shortName: Number of families living at family centre
fields.helpText: This can be with one or 2 parents and one or more children.

sections.title: Will your family centre provide any of these services?
sections.shortName: Family centre's services
sections.description: Select all that apply.

fields.label: Will your family centre offer any of these services?
choices: Take direct referrals from a court
Care for adults (people over 18) who do not have their children with them
Regularly admit children accompanied by carers other than their parents
Provide a service other than that of the residential family centre

sections.title: How much will you charge the people using your fostering agency?
sections.shortName: Charge for people using fostering agency

fields.shortName: Range of fees for fostering agency services
fields.helpText: Include details of the range of fees for all of your services. For example, Â£500 to Â£1,000 to foster a child a week.

sections.shortName: Voluntary adoption agency's services
sections.description: Select only one service type

fields.label: What type of adoption service will you provide?
choices: Domestic adoption and adoption support services
Inter-country adoption and adoption support services
Domestic and inter-country adoption and adoption support services

sections.title: Will the voluntary adoption agency have any branches?
sections.shortName: Will voluntary adoption agency have branches

fields.label: Will the voluntary adoption agency have any branches?
fields.shortName: Will voluntary adoption agency have branches
fields.helpText: You must complete an application to register as a social care provider form for each branch of your voluntary adoption agency.

sections.title: Tell us about the address and registration details for all your branches 1
sections.shortName: Registration details of branch 1

fields.label: Do you need to add another branch?

fields.label: Do you need to add another branch?

sections.shortName: Have an adoption panel

sections.shortName: If more than one branch, will you have more than one adoption panel

fields.label: If your agency has more than one branch, will you have more than one adoption panel?

sections.title: Will your agency provide birth records counselling?
sections.shortName: Will agency provide birth records counselling
sections.description: This is where your agency will provide counselling support to individuals that want their birth record details.

fields.label: Will your agency provide birth records counselling?

sections.title: Will your agency provide intermediary services?
sections.shortName: Will agency provide intermediary services
sections.description: This is where you will help birth relatives and adopted people find information, trace and make contact with each other.

fields.label: Will your agency provide intermediary services?

sections.title: How much will you charge the people using your adoption agency?
sections.shortName: Charges for people using your Voluntary adoption agency

fields.shortName: Range of fees for adoption agency services
fields.helpText: Include details of the range of fees for all of your services. For example, Â£25 to Â£50 an hour to provide therapeutic services for adopted children.

sections.title: Who will your adoption support agency provide support to?
sections.shortName: Service users of adoption support agency

fields.label: Who will your adoption support agency provide support to?

sections.title: Will your agency provide any of these services?
sections.shortName: Adoption support agency services

fields.label: Will your agency provide any of these services?
fields.helpText: Tick all the services that your agency will provide.
choices: Counselling services to help with adoption
Mediation services and support to help children with their adopted families, potential families or former families
Therapy services to help children with their adopted families, potential families or former families
Relationship support services to help build a relationship between the adoptive parents and the children
Mitigation support services where there is or could be a disruption in an adoption, or placement for adoptionSecond selectable choice
Support to adoption agencies in preparing and training parents who want to adopt
optionHelpText: This includes helping birth relatives and adopted people find information, trace and make contact with each other.
This includes art or play therapy
This includes training parents so that they can meet the child's special needs
This includes mediation services and organising meetings to discuss disruptions

sections.title: What is the age range of the children you will care for at your holiday scheme?
sections.shortName: Age range of children at holiday scheme

fields.label: Age of youngest child
fields.helpText: For example, 8

fields.label: Age of oldest child
fields.helpText: For example, 16

sections.title: How much will you charge the people using your holiday scheme?
sections.shortName: Charges for people using holiday scheme

fields.shortName: Range of fees for holiday scheme services
fields.helpText: Include details of the range of fees for all of your services. For example, Â£50 to Â£100 to look after a child.

sections.title: Who is the proposed registered manager of the establishment or agency?
sections.shortName: Proposed manager

fields.infoText: The manager is the person who will manage your new establishment or agency.

As we decide both your children's social care service's and manager's registration applications at the same time, the manager must have their security checks completed before we can decide on your application.

fields.label: The manager must apply to be the proposed registered manager of your new children's social care service unless you are registering a voluntary adoption agency, in which case we only need their details on this page.
fields.infoText: The manager must apply to be the proposed registered manager of your new children's social care service unless you are registering a voluntary adoption agency, in which case we only need their details on this page.

sections.title: Other than your establishment or agency, is the manager running any other social care services?
sections.shortName: Manager running any other social care services

fields.label: Is the manager already running any other establishment, agency or business? Or will they do so in future?

sections.title: Will the manager run any other social care services?
sections.shortName: Will manager run any other social care services

fields.label: Is the manager already running any other establishment, agency or business? Or will they do so in future?

sections.title: Tell us about all the children's social care services the manager is running or will run
sections.shortName: Children's services manager running or will run

fields.label: Provide details of the establishment the manager is running or will run in the future
fields.shortName: Details of social care services manager is running
fields.helpText: Include the name and address of each establishment or agency and the date of when they started work or will start work

sections.title: Have you carried out all the required checks to ensure that the proposed manager is a fit person to run your adoption agency?
sections.shortName: Carried out checks on proposed manager

fields.label: By law, you must carry out checks on the person who will manage your adoption agency.
fields.infoText: By law, you must carry out checks on the person who will manage your adoption agency.

fields.shortName: All checks completed for manager of adoption agency

sections.title: Do you have these policy documents to upload for your new children's home?
sections.shortName: Do you have policy documents for your children's home

fields.infoText:
By law, you need to provide these documents for us to consider your application to register a children's home:

- Statement of purpose
- Equalities policy
- Copy of certificate of insurance or written confirmation that insurance will be provided 
- Children's guide 
- Missing Child policy 
- Safeguarding policy
- Behaviour management policy
- Prevention of bullying policy
- Complaints procedure
- Location assessment

choices: No, I do not have these documents

sections.title: Do you have these policy documents to upload for your new residential family centre?
sections.shortName: Do you have policy documents for your residentialy family centre

fields.infoText:
By law, you need to provide these documents for us to consider your application to register a *residential family centre*:

- Statement of purpose
- Equalities policy
- Copy of certificate of insurance or written confirmation that insurance will be provided
- Children's guide
- Accident and missing resident procedure
- Safeguarding policy
- Prevention of bullying policy
- Complaints procedure

choices: No, I do not have these documents

sections.title: Do you have these policy documents to upload for your new agency?
sections.shortName: Do you have policy documents for your agency

fields.infoText:
By law, you need to provide these documents for us to consider your application to register a voluntary support agency or voluntary adoption agency :

- Statement of purpose
- Equalities policy
- Copy of certificate of insurance or written confirmation that insurance will be provided
- Children's guide
- Safeguarding policy
- Complaints procedure

choices: No, I do not have these documents

sections.title: Do you have these policy documents to upload for your new fostering agency?
sections.shortName: Policy documents for your fostering agency

fields.infoText:
By law, you need to provide these documents for us to consider your application to register an independent fostering agency:

- Statement of purpose
- Equalities policy
- Copy of certificate of insurance or written confirmation that insurance will be provided
- Children's guide
- Missing Child policy
- Safeguarding policy
- Behaviour management policy
- Prevention of bullying policy
- Complaints procedure

choices: No, I do not have these documents

sections.title: Do you have these policy documents to upload for your new holiday scheme?
sections.shortName: Do you have policy documents for your holiday scheme

fields.infoText:
By law, you need to provide these documents for us to consider your application to register a residential holiday scheme for disabled children:

- Statement of purpose
- Equalities policy
- Copy of certificate of insurance or written confirmation that insurance will be provided
- Missing Child policy
- Safeguarding policy
- Behaviour management policy
- Prevention of bullying policy
- Complaints procedure

choices: No, I do not have these documents

sections.title: Upload your new establishment's or agency's missing child policy
sections.shortName: Your children's services missing child policy

fields.infoText: Your policy should describe what steps you will take to prevent children from being absent without permission and what you will do when children go missing.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's home location assessment
sections.shortName: Children's home location assessment

fields.infoText: Your assessment should include any risks and opportunities you found and your plan to manage the risks and make the opportunities available for children. For example, the risk could be busy roads and the opportunity could be accessing a local park.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's complaints procedure
sections.shortName: Your children service's complaints procedure

fields.infoText: Your policy should set out how you will handle complaints about your social care service.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's prevention of bullying policy
sections.shortName: Your children service's prevention of bullying policy

fields.infoText: The policy should describe how you will prevent bullying and how you will handle allegations of bullying.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your children's social care service's behaviour management policy
sections.shortName: Your children service's behaviour management policy

fields.infoText: Your policy should describe how you will promote good behaviour and how you will use restraint.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's safeguarding policy
sections.shortName: Your children service's safeguarding policy

fields.infoText: Your policy should describe how you will keep children safe from abuse or neglect and raise concerns about children at risk of harm to the authorities.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's statement of purpose
sections.shortName: Your children service's statement of purpose

fields.infoText:
Your statement should describe what you do, where you do it and who you do it for.

It can include:

- aims and objectives.
- services you provide.
- needs your service meets.
- your contact details
- your service's legal entity
- places where services are provided

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's children guide
sections.shortName: Your children service's children guide

fields.infoText: Your guide should be written for children describing what to expect from your service.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's copy of certificate of insurance
sections.shortName: Your children service's copy of certificate of insurance

fields.infoText:
By law, all social care providers must have public liability insurance for their establishment or agency.

If you are getting the insurance, an authorised person from your organisation must upload a written statement confirming you will be insured before operating as a social care provider.

fields.helpText: We accept documents in formats like PDF and JPEG (2MB maximum).

sections.title: Upload your new children's social care service's equalities policy
sections.shortName: Your children service's equalities policy

fields.infoText: Your policy must set out how your establishment or agency will value individuals, combat discrimination and safeguard those who may face inequality or harassment due to one or more of the characteristics protected under the Equality Act 2010.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: Upload your residential family centre's accident and missing resident procedure
sections.shortName: Your children service's accident and missing resident procedure

fields.infoText: We need to know your plan for when a resident is injured in an accident or goes missing at your residential family centre.

fields.helpText:
We accept documents in PDF and JPEG and a file size up to 2MB.

If your file is larger than this, compress it before uploading it.

sections.title: You do not have the right documents to continue with this application
sections.shortName: Do not have the right documents to continue

fields.infoText: By law, you must provide your new social care service's policy documents for us to consider your application.

We will reject your application without these documents if you submit it without them.

You can continue with this application if you plan to come back later to upload the documents.
You must enter the details of someone who is authorised to sign this declaration.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example, director or company secretary

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.infoText:
- the information that you have submitted is true to the best of your knowledge and complete

- the details you provided in the service you are applying to register in this application form the conditions of your registration with Ofsted

- to notify Ofsted of any changes to the information on this form which may affect my suitability to provide social care.

- all the information you have given on this application form is true to the best of your knowledge and belief

- you either as an individual who is providing the service or your organisation has enough funds to fulfil your duties and obligations as a registered social care agency or establishment

- every person who works, or is intended to work for the purposes of the establishment or agency who has regular contact with children or access to sensitive information about children, has an enhanced Disclosure and Barring Service certificate, where they are eligible for one

You may be prosecuted and your application refused if you deliberately give untrue or missing information.

Your application is not complete until you have paid the application fee

Ofsted will carry out checks and using the information provided from the checks and this application form as explained above
By submitting this form, you declare and agree that
This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

fields.label: What happens next
fields.infoText:
We have sent your application to the registration team.

The responsible and registered individuals, partners and managers need to complete an SC2 application form.

They will contact you either to confirm that your application register has been accepted and is ready to be considered, or to ask for more information.

If you need to contact us about your application, you can call our helpline on 0300 123 1231. We are open from 8am to 6pm (Monday to Friday).
